snippet: A judge on Friday granted prosecutors permission to exhume the body of a Chicago man who was poisoned with cyanide just as he was about to collect a $425,000 lottery prize.
abstract: Judge grants prosecutors permission to exhume body of Urooj Khan, Chicago man who was poisoned with cyanide just as he was about to collect a $425,000 lottery prize.
lead_paragraph: A judge on Friday granted prosecutors permission to exhume the body of a Chicago man who was poisoned with cyanide just as he was about to collect a $425,000 lottery prize.

headline.main: Illinois: Body of Lottery Winner Will Be Exhumed
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Body of Lottery Winner Will Be Exhumed
